data.title: Jenna Johnson Relationship with Val Chmerkovskiy, Boyfriend
data.meta_description: Jenna Johnson is an American ballroom dancer who has made a name for herself, especially after participating in the American television dance competition
data.text:
Jenna Johnson is an American ballroom dancer who has made a name for herself, especially after participating in the American television dance competition So You Think You Can Dance which airs on Fox in the United States. Jenna is particularly good at everything that has to do with dance. This is probably due to the fact that she started dancing when she was 3 years old.

In addition to her role in So You Think Can Dance, she is a professional dancer in the troupe. Dancing with the Stars. Jenna has taken professional classes in ballroom, ballet, jazz, contemporary and hip-hop to improve her floor skills and her efforts have paid off as the outcome of her training is quite evident.

Jenna Johnson Bio

Jenna Johnson was born on April 12, 1994 in Provo, Utah to parents Curt Johnson and Tamara Jean. It’s also where she grew up with her family of five siblings. She attended Timpview High School and graduated in 2012.

At such a young age, Jenna is at the top of her game and doing everything she can to maintain it. As a dancer, Jenna has proven that it takes a lot more than just wearing her dancing shoes and moving to the beat. To keep herself in shape, she follows a training practice that she adheres to, to keep her limber and to make sure her skills don’t get rusty.

Proving further that she takes her routine seriously, Jenna gave a hint about the five (5) things she does to keep in shape. Her absolutely gorgeous abs are proof of that. According to her, to stay in shape, maintain your routine, know your weaknesses, compliment yourself, be aware of what you eat and know and understand your body. Follow these 5 rules and your abs will have a chance to look as amazing as Jenna.

She competed on Season 10 of “So You ThinkYou Can Dance” after auditioning in Memphis, Tennessee and passing. Previously, two of her siblings auditioned for the show and were overwhelmed at Green Mile. At the show, she partnered with Tucker Knox, a contemporary dancer. The pair put on a strong performance and moved up to eighth place.

Boyfriend

As far as relationships and boyfriends go, Jenna’s been on quite the journey. Her current boyfriend is Valentine Chmerkovskiy, a Ukrainian-American professional dancer. Val was born on March 24, 1986 to Valentin Aleksandrovich “Val” Chmerkovskiy in Odessa. He has an older brother, Maksim Chmerkovskiy, who is also a professional dancer with Dancing With The Stars.

Val is best known for his appearances on the American version of Dancing with the Stars which he won…twice. He first appeared in season 2 of the show in February 2006 as a student under his older brother, and then again in season 4 where he participated in a dance party against his brother. Val appeared in all other seasons from season 10 to 25 and finished in first position twice for seasons 20 and 23.

Before getting serious with Jenna, Val dated famed Amber Rose for 5 months from 2016 to early 2017. His relationship with Jenna at the time was volatile with no real involvement.

Jenna Johnson’s relationship with Val Chmerkovskiy

The love vibes between Jenna and Val seem to be getting stronger as the days go by. The first two met and embarked on a very low-key new adventure until the summer of 2017, when they finally came to the bold decision to make the ultimate PDA whenever they could and profess their love for all. who care to listen.

In August 2017, People Magazine mentioned Val, man in love, a few weeks after his trip to Europe with Jenna. During an interview, he admitted that he was in love. He then posted a photo of himself kissing Jenna’s head with a caption that read, “But the real price, but.”
